sourcesContent:
Carrito de Compras

{{ item.title }}

{{ item.quantity }} ${{ item.price | number: '1.2-2' }}

Productos Guardados

{{ item.title }}

Cantidad: {{ item.quantity }} ${{ item.price | number: '1.2-2' }}

Resumen de compra

Productos: {{ cartItems.length }} - ${{ totalPrice | number: '1.2-2' }}

Envío: ${{ envio }}

Total: ${{ totalAmount | number: '1.2-2' }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../services/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carrito', templateUrl: './carrito.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carrito.component.css'] }) export class CarritoComponent implements OnInit { cartItems: any[] = []; summary: { numberOfProducts: number, totalPrice: number } = { numberOfProducts: 0, totalPrice: 0 }; shippingCost: number = Math.floor(Math.random() * 2000) + 2000; // Random number > 2000 totalAmount: number = 0; constructor(private cartService: CartService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.cartItems = this.cartService.getCart(); this.summary = this.cartService.getCartSummary(); this.totalAmount = this.summary.totalPrice + this.shippingCost; } updateQuantity(item: any): void { // Recalculate the total amount when quantity is updated this.summary = this.cartService.getCartSummary(); this.totalAmount = this.summary.totalPrice + this.shippingCost; } }
